name: E-learning Mind
overview:
E-learning Mind provides high-quality, cost-effective online training and courses that engage participants and meet learning objectives—at a fraction of the cost of the other guys.

Are you searching for high-quality e-learning courses to transform expensive in-person learning events into efficient, globally accessible training? Would you like to reduce the costs of your existing e-learning development efforts? At E-learning Mind, we work with small and large companies from a variety of industries to create e-learning courses that meet your company’s objectives—on budget and on time. Our engagements range from fast turnaround projects to large custom e-learning initiatives.

Whether your project requires e-learning as the sole training method or as a blended learning approach with live training, implementing online learning can increase your company’s efficiency and save you money. Each e-learning course we develop is customized to meet your unique needs, helping you achieve your learning objectives in the most engaging and interactive way possible.

Whatever your company’s goals—employee training, increased communication and awareness, or compliance, we can design a course or product that maximizes your resources and gets results.
